author: Tess Owen, Michael Learmonth
title: Coronavirus Is Spreading Through America’s Prisons and No One Is Ready
description: “Whatever gets in here starts spreading, and everyone gets it.”
content:

Justin Ray Faircloth has started keeping his spoon after meals at Limestone Correctional Facility, Alabamas largest state prison. Hes not supposed to, but he figures that the fewer people touch… [+7562 chars]
